name: getElementRequiredTransaction
snippet: <fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList"><Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable"><Value><Calculation><![CDATA[JSONGetElement ( $scriptParams; "{{elementName}}" )]]></Calculation></Value><Repetition><Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation></Repetition><Name>${{elementName}}</Name></Step><Step enable="True" id="207" name="Revert Transaction"><Option state="True"></Option><Condition><Calculation><![CDATA[IsEmpty ( ${{elementName}} )]]></Calculation></Condition><ErrorCode><Calculation><![CDATA[5499]]></Calculation></ErrorCode><ErrorMessage><Calculation><![CDATA[error.Set ( 958 ; "Missing required parameter: {{elementName}}" ; "Parameter check" )]]></Calculation></ErrorMessage></Step></fmxmlsnippet>
